Orlando, Michael.

This is a big word. Vigenere cipher was used on it and then we hashed each letter with different hashing algorithms 
that could be easily broken.

Including the dot this is the flag all lowercase.

pentesters_need_patience_not_only_skills-2024.

All the hashes are different but easy to crack :)

After vigenere
wepdijaetc_rvld_rkxzlneo_r fa_opvc_jrinvw-2024.
